fullText: Michael Urie brings ferocious commitment to his portrayal of Arnold Beckoff, the drag queen searching for love and family in Harvey Fierstein's groundbreaking play.
dtliExcerpt: Michael Urie brings ferocious commitment to his portrayal of Arnold Beckoff, the drag queen searching for love and family in Harvey Fierstein's groundbreaking play.
